subject: Max Memory Heap
msgSnippet: Does anyone know how to set the Max Memory Heap size for ant?  I was thinking that something like this might work: ant -Dmx=128 build But this doesn t work.
messageBody:
Does anyone know how to set the Max Memory Heap size for ant? I was
thinking that something like this might work:

ant -Dmx=128 build

But this doesn't work. It looks like the jvm never gets larger than
60MB or 70MB. I wrote a custom task and I need to be able to set the
max heap to at least 1GB.

Thanks in advance,

Bart
